data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Shonan's Akimi Barada misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Shimizu takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 5, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Shonan.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Masaaki Toma signals a Shonan throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Masaaki Toma signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Shimizu's area.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Shizuoka.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa is on target but unsuccessful.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
Shimizu are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 19, Masaaki Toma has awarded Shonan a corner.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yusuke Goto's header is off-target for Shimizu.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 27, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Masaaki Toma signals a Shonan throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Masaaki Toma awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 29, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu's Keita Nakamura has been booked in Shizuoka.
In the minute 35, Shonan to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Goal kick for Shonan at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 37, Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Shimizu.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 39, Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Akimi Barada (Shonan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 42, Masaaki Toma awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Yusuke Goto for Shimizu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 45, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Shizuoka.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
The first half has been concluded at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shonan.
In the minute 49, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
Attention is being given to Shonanâ€™s Hiroto Nakagawa and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 56, Shonan's Hiroto Nakagawa is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Akimi Barada of Shonan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Hiroto Nakagawa is on target to give Shonan a 0-1 advantage.
Kazunari Ono with an assist there.
In the minute 61, Throw-in Shonan.
Free kick Shonan.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Shizuoka.
Shota Kobayashi (Shonan) has replaced the possibly injured Hiroto Nakagawa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 62, The away team replace Temma Matsuda with Naoki Ishihara.
Shimizu make their first substitution with Riyo Kawamoto replacing Shota Kaneko.
In the minute 63, Peter Cklamovski is making the team's second substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Yuito Suzuki replacing Yusuke Goto.
Goal! Carlinhos Junior equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Elsinho.
In the minute 65, Shimizu push forward at IAI Stadium Nihondaira and Carlinhos Junior gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shonan defence.
Yuito Suzuki gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
Goal kick for Shonan at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 69, Shimizu needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
Kazuki Oiwa is replacing Akimi Barada for the away team.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team have replaced Mitsuki Saito with Hidetoshi Miyuki. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Masaaki Toma awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Carlinhos Junior of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 81, Masaaki Toma signals a Shimizu throw-in in Shonan's half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Masaaki Toma signals a Shimizu throw-in in Shonan's half.
In the minute 83, In Shizuoka Shimizu attack through Elsinho. The finish is off target, however.
Shonan have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Teerasil Dangda for Shimizu is whistled offside.
Kota Miyamoto is on a sub for Keita Nakamura for Shimizu.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Riyo Kawamoto with Teerasil Dangda.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Masaaki Toma awards the home team a throw-in.
Shimizu are pushing forward but Carlinhos Junior's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Masaaki Toma will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Elsinho (Shimizu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Bin Ukishima (Shonan) is making a fifth substitution, with Yuki Ohashi replacing Sosuke Shibata.
